layout.title: Centralia Travel Agency
layout.description: Discover unforgettable journeys with Centralia Travel Agency. Explore customized tours, cultural experiences, and hassle-free travel to top destinations worldwide. Book your next adventure today!

footer.description: Your trusted gateway to Central Asia's hidden treasures. We craft extraordinary journeys that go beyond the ordinary, connecting you with authentic experiences and lasting memories.

head.title: Discover the Heart of Central Asia
head.description: Embark on extraordinary journeys through ancient Silk Road cities, pristine mountains, and vibrant cultures

countries.title: Explore Central Asia
countries.description: From ancient Silk Road cities to pristine mountine lakes, each destination offers extraordinary experiense waiting to be discovered

signatureJourneys.title: Signature Journeys
signatureJourneys.description: Discover our best-selling adventures chosen by thousands of travelers

travelersComment.title: What Our Travelers Say
travelersComment.description: Real experiences from real adventurers who've explored Central Asia with us

items.comment: Absolutely incredible experience! The architecture in Samarkand is breathtaking, and our guide was so knowledgeable about the history.
The most adventurous trip of my life! The landscapes are otherworldly and the local hospitality is amazing.
Perfect blend of nature and culture. The lake is stunning and the nomad experience was authentic.

travelInsights.title: Travel Insights
travelInsights.description: Expert guides, cultural insights, and practical tips to help you make the most of your Central Asian adventure

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.description: Our team constantly works towards putting their experience and knowledge to good use by helping you coordinate a hassle-free hut-to-hut hiking holiday.
AboutPage.title2: Hey, I'm Samo. Let me introduce you to the story behind Hut to Hut Hiking Austria.
AboutPage.description2: Like every great adventure, we started small, with a close-knit group of young, enthusiastic hikers who loved nothing more than spending our days in nature. While I’m usually the first person you’ll hear from – replying to your emails or chatting with you on a video call to help pick the perfect trail – I’m really just the starting point. Behind me is a whole team of hikers, travel advisors, and route planners who live and breathe the trails we send you on.
AboutPage.title3: From Local Trails to Worldwide Adventures
AboutPage.description3: Based in Slovenia, where the Julian Alps begin just beyond our doorstep, it felt only natural to start sharing the beauty of our homeland—and eventually, the world—with others. What started as a small initiative has grown into something far bigger. As more and more travellers joined our hikes, our team expanded too, bringing in destination experts, trail planners, route designers, and a behind-the-scenes support team.Step by step, our hiking portfolio grew beyond Slovenia, across Europe, and eventually to the most scenic trails in Asia and the Americas. With so many epic journeys under our belt, it became clear that we needed one united identity to bring it all together.

items.title: Samo – Lead Travel Advisoy
items.info: Samo's love for the mountains started in his childhood, sparked by the books of Slovenian alpinists like Tomaž Humar and Silvo Karo. He found their Himalayan adventures so inspiring that he dedicated himself to summiting the Slovenian Alps. During his college years, he made his first ascents as an alpinist, which brought him closer to his childhood idols. These days, he devotes his time to trail running but remains a frequent visitor of the mountains.

ToursPage.title: Discover the World's Hidden Gems
ToursPage.description: Embark on journeys that blend natural wonders, rich cultures, and unforgettable memories. Our tours are crafted to inspire, connect, and give you experiences that last a lifetime.

BlogsPage.title: Journey Wisdom
BlogsPage.description: Gain valuable tips, cultural knowledge, and expert advice to make every step of your journey richer and more meaningful, wherever your travels take you.
